Коротко, вся суть игры:
Фейскемпишь и туннелишь -rep.
Нормально играешь на маньяке, всё равно -rep, такой туннерел что капец, и не важно, что ты на самом деле и не туннелил, сурвам виднее, хых.
Ты без перков и адоннов попался против пати задротов, ну какой же ты слабый ман, удали игру и -rep.
Не снял с крюка против кемпера, ты самый конченный сурв, -rep.
Снял с крюка выжившего, но ман потом догнал его и повесил обратно, ну и мрaзь же ты, -rep.
Сыграл максимально хорошо, спас выжившего, починил геник, похилил тиммейтов, яичницу пожарил, посадил картошку, вырастил сына, маньяка замансил и напоследок ещё и обнять его успел, а затем сбежал, похвалы не жди, ты всё-равно плохой тиммейт, потому что не дал снять с крюка.
Если ты русский, то однозначно -rep в профиль.
Не отпустил сурва, токсик, а если отпустил, то тряпка, гы гы гы.
Добрая и позитивная игра короче! :3

Так же это игра, где маньяка унижают чаще, чем выживших :D

Great game for people who play alone and people who play with others. The horror element is great with a simple game premise but deep within the lore and character builds. Every game I play is very different from the next and with the lore challenges out I can't help myself from grinding in hours. This game is for the teenage and above audience with your favorite cast of characters. It is fun competing with friends and learning new ways of mastering the ways to greatness. 10/10

I recently went back and played DbD 1.0, and then DbD 1.9.3.

God, those games were MUCH MUCH better.

This isn't nostalgia, I started playing when Pinhead came out. The old DbDs, at least from what I played, were 10x less sweaty and toxic. Even when I played with random people, I had fun playing normally. DbD now is a toxic, unfun, unoptimized piece of shit. After months of people begging, they finally did a health update that arguably made some perks that deserved a nerf better. (Dead Hard). The devs have no idea what they're doing, except continue to pander for extra cash.
Very recommended for those who love horror survivor games, let the adrenaline flow!

After 467 hours of constant mental strain, I've concluded this game isn't meant for the everyday person. You have to be a special kind of psychopath to THOROUGHLY enjoy this terribly amazing take on a horror game. Is it good? BY ALL MEANS YES! Is it fun? It doesn't even come close to being slightly enjoyable to even think about playing. No matter how hard I try I cant stop pressing that ready up button. 10/10

(Almost 100 hrs played) 
Killer has lost identity. I don't know if I'll still play this game or not. It's obvious most of the thumbs up are from survivors side. Killer side lacks any depth into winning anymore. Match making is unfair so most games you will either be babysit or bullied by survivors. Not sure what will happen to this game after this new match making thing is implemented, but doesn't appear positive with player base. Something is wrong with the game when you can play like you're cheating and have more fun than playing it the way it was meant to be played (gen rushing and tunneling). Expect most matches to be hardly fair as most of the players you play against will abuse powerful perks and tools to make the matches feel like a chore. Killer is riddled with problems so I'll just play survivor for now. Survivor is so easy to play that some players who play survivor will troll you end game and think they are great. The game will step in and pat you on the back if you happen to chase good enough even with no kills and give you almost full points for mediocre matches. It makes no sense. Also no way to disable the game chat either. With MMR, I can't play killer and have a good time anymore. Now I have more stress playing it that it affects my relationships and work. Sad to see this game dying slowly. Guess I'll hang around for whatever is left, idk.

It's a fun game. The only real similar game I've played to DBD is Friday the 13th: The Game, and while the gameplay is certainly different, I think DBD does a lot of things better. When I went into public matches in F13 with friends and one of us was killer, naturally it was kind of unfair for the other people. In this game they don't allow you to play killer in a party, which I think solves a large issue.

There is some toxicity to how people play the game but if I'm honest being the killer in general is toxic in nature lol. This game is a lot better with friends, but if you are okay with a lack of voice chat then I suppose multiplayer with randoms is sufficient.
